channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My brother refuses to sell our family’s $150K lake house, yet I pay all the bills. Do I push it and risk ruining our relationship?
item.description: ”I have no intention of going back to the lake house, yet he expects me to pay for upkeep and taxes.”

item.title: Why smart investors are ignoring the 2026 Super Bowl Indicator
item.description: Bulls want the Seahawks; bears cheer the Patriots. You shouldn’t worry if your team loses.

item.title: Burry says he’s ‘happy’ even as shares of insurer he’s championed, Molina, dive nearly 30%
item.description: “Big Short” investor Michael Burry isn’t the slightest bit deterred by the profit warning at Molina Healthcare.

item.title: Jeep maker Stellantis facing worst-ever stock rout as it takes $26 billion hit over miscalculating EV demand
item.description: Shares of Stellantis are headed for their worst-ever day of trading after the carmaker announced a massive charge to reset its business.

item.title: ‘I love being debt-free’: I’m in my mid-50s and buying a house. Do I take out a $400K mortgage or use my Roth IRA?
item.description: “I’ll fund $500,000 of that from the sale of my current house.”

item.title: This Amazon options trade takes advantage of the stock's 'sale' price
item.description: Amazon is on sale, KKM Financial's Jeff Kilburg says. Here is how an investor can establish a long position and also finance this bullish spread.

item.title: Friday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The sharp sell-off in tech stocks continued on Thursday, dragging the S&P 500 into negative territory for 2026.

item.title: Goldman Sachs upgrades this energy stock on Meta nuclear power deal, sees 40% upside
item.description: Goldman Sachs sees additional upside for Vistra if it contracts out more of its nuclear fleet through power purchasing agreements.

item.title: Amazon is dipping on margin and capex concerns. Wall Street analysts still see upside
item.description: Analysts remained overwhelmingly bullish on Amazon, although most cut their price targets.

item.title: Dan Ives names 5 stocks to buy amid software 'Armageddon'
item.description: The Wedbush analyst thinks there are still winners to be found among software stocks despite the recent sell-off.

item.title: SelectQuote Surges 23% on $415M Credit Facility News
item.description: SelectQuote (SLQT) stock jumped 23% on January 12, 2026 after securing a $415M credit facility. Dive into the details, risks, benefits, and how simila...

item.title: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) Soars on Promising Inflammation Drug Data
item.description: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) stock surges over 42% on positive Phase 1 data for MRT-8102, showing profound reductions in inflammation marker hsCRP. ...
